items.summary:
Delamu 48- by 36-inch Office Desk Chair Mat

Buy for $32 (Reg. $46)

What we love

If you want a chair mat that stands out from standard solutions, this one may do the trick. It features a woven pattern that is a mix between black and brown for a detailed and more striking design when compared with more traditional options.

items.title: Heading to Ukraine, French minister says support will continue despite political woes
items.summary: PARIS (Reuters) -France's minister for European affairs said on Tuesday that French military support for Ukraine would continue despite political turbulence in Paris, as France awaited the nomination of its fifth prime minister in less than two years. Read full story

items.title: All of the must-see 25W Qi2.2 MagSafe charging gear debuting ahead of iPhone 17
items.summary:
Apple is revealing all of its “Awe dropping” new gear today and we are at Steve’s Jobs Theater to catch it all in person. The new slate of third-party accessories are bursting at the seams today and Apple have a new lineup of accessories of its own on display today, but the biggest thing in iPhone add-ons is perhaps all of the new 25W Qi2.2 gear. We will be charging our next-gen (or iPhone 16) Apple handsets faster than ever this year and there is already some intriguing new 25W gear surfacing ahead of iPhone 17 reveal day. 

more…

items.title: Ecuador seizes over $300 million in properties from armed group
items.summary: QUITO (Reuters) -Hundreds of Ecuadorean police seized over $313 million in real estate assets in a mass raid of properties held by the Comandos de la Frontera, or 'Border Command,' armed group, the interior ministry said in a statement on Tuesday. Read full story

items.title: For the rest of the day save $60 and bring 8-in-1 functionality to yard work with Worx’s Aerocart at $170 (Reg. up to $230)
items.summary:
As part of its Deals of the Day, Best Buy is offering the Worx Aerocart 8-in-1 Yard Cart at $169.99 shipped, with the price also matching over at Amazon. When it is at full price, you’ll often find it ranging between $200 and $230, with the discounts we’ve spotted this year mostly keeping things around $173, though we’ve been seeing more recent returns to $170 and the $169 low. While it may have gone lower in past years, today’s deal gives you a $60 price cut to the third-lowest price we have tracked in 2025 – just $1 above the annual low.

more…

items.title: Outfit your nightstand or other space with Baseus’ 6-in-1 40W USB-C surge protector for $27.50 (Save 40%)
items.summary:
Baseus 6-in-1 40W USB-C Surge Protector

Buy for $27.50 (Reg. $45.50)

Clip the on-page 40% off coupon.

What we love

I’ve been using a similar charger from Baseus in my nightstand for about year now, and it’s still working without a hitch. This particular unit is outfitted with three AC outlets, 18W USB-A, and dual 20W USB-C. Another perk is that it wields built-in 1,200J surge protection, adding an additional layer of safety for your devices.

items.title: Tour of Spain stage halted early due to pro-Palestine protest

items.title: EcoFlow’s Home Backup/Hurricane Preparedness Sale takes up to 62% off power stations + extra savings from $90
items.summary:
While its Labor Day event has ended, EcoFlow is still far from done offering discounts with its current Home Backup/Hurricane Preparedness Sale running through September 14. Among the lineup, we’ve spotted returning deals (and officially new lows) on the new TRAIL series of power stations, with the TRAIL 200 DC 60,000mAh Portable Power Station back at $113.05 shipped, after using the sitewide code 25EFDCAFF at checkout for an additional 5% taken off your order, while the TRAIL 300 DC 90,000mAh Portable Power Station is at $151.05 shipped, after using the same promo code. They’d normally fetch $200 and $250 at full price, which we saw brought down to these same rates during last month’s launch. This sale gives you another shot at the best prices we have tracked, saving you $87 and/or $99 off the respective models. Head below for more on these and the other offers we’re seeing during this sale.

items.title: LBGTQ rights lawyer indicted for lying during Alabama 'judge shopping' inquiry

items.title: Commute up to 50 miles on the 34-pound Vanpowers City Vanture urban commuter e-bike at $799 (Reg. $1,749)
items.summary:
Vanpowers is offering a special promotion on its City Vanture Urban Commuter e-bike at $799 shipped, after using the code VANVIP in your cart for an additional $300 off. This e-bike would normally cost you $1,749 at full price, which is starting already down at $1,099, which is where most discounts this year have kept the costs. The extra $300 in savings, though, makes this deal all the better as it cuts a combined $950 off the tag for the best price we have tracked directly from the brand, landing as the second-lowest price behind a one-time exclusive deal from Wellbots back in January.

items.title: Lexar’s new high-speed MagSafe SSD with direct ProRes recording now up for grabs just in time for iPhone 17 launch
items.summary:
Right on cue with today’s iPhone 17 unveiling, Lexar’s newly launched ES5 magnetic portable SSD is now up for pre-orders at Amazon. It’s available in 1TB and 2TB capacities, and they’re both up for grabs at Amazon. The 1TB variant is priced at $119.99, and it starts shipping tomorrow, while the 2TB model is at $199.99 shipped and it hits the shelves on October 1. It’s a good option to consider for on-the-go creators looking to pick up a speedy drive, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

Roughly a month before yesterday’s teaser reveal of the new LEGO Star Trek sets, we got our first look at this year’s new brick-built Advent calendars. These sets tend to sell lout quickly, especially once they hit retail outside of the LEGO Store, but Amazon just dropped the price on the 2025 LEGO City Advent Calendar down to $24.99 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. This deal is also live over at Walmart.

items.title: This deal on Lenovo’s liquid-cooled Legion gaming PC is too good to pass up at a whopping $1,121 off today
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Lenovo that drops one of its Legion gaming PC with Ultra 9 275HX/32GB/1TB/RTX 5070 Ti down to $1,678.99 shipped. Don’t forget to enter promo codes BUYMORELENOVO and LEGIONSAVE10 during checkout to see the discounted price. You are looking at a massive $1,121 discount on this tower that carries a $2,800 price tag, and it marks the lowest price we have tracked for it. We saw the Ryzen-powered variant of this PC with an RTX 5070 see a huge discount last month, but this is the first time we’re seeing this particular machine with RTX 5070 Ti drop this low. Today’s deal delivers some serious value under $1,700, considering the same PC with an Ultra 7 processor and an RTX 5060 Ti itself is currently going for $1,600 at Best Buy. Be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

more…

items.title: Land WD’s half TB Xbox Series X|S Expansion card while it’s down at just $65 (2025 low)
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops WD_BLACK’S 512GB C50 Storage Expansion Card for Xbox Series X|S down to $64.99 shipped. This particular drive has lately been sitting at the $96 mark at Amazon, so you’re looking at a 32% discount today. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this half TB variant this year, and it’s now within just $5 of the all-time low it hit during the Prime Day sale last year. You can also get this in 1TB and 2TB capacities, both of which are also seeing lighter deals at the moment. Head below for more details.

more…
